infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan barcodes on attendee lanyards.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to find nearby events and workshops.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app uses reminders to remind you to attend events and workshops.

permissions.READ_CALENDAR: This app uses the calendar to display user's scheduled events on map.
permissions.WRITE_CALENDAR: This app uses the calendar to record events that interest the user.
